Description:
Ripe for Renovation
AUCTION 17th August 12.30pm
On a quiet road within walking distance of the Belgrave-Gembrook bus and just 2km to Emerald Secondary College, is this straightforward Hills-style Western Red Cedar home.
Sure, there is work to be done. But it is entirely liveable, and with good bones and plenty of scope, you can make this home your own.
This open plan, split level 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is ripe for renovating. From the entrance, you have a view of the whole interior. The meals area is easily serviced by the adjacent kitchen, continue through the home to the family bathroom, 2 bedrooms and laundry. Downstairs there is a living area and master bedroom with ensuite. Heating options include a Coonara, electric, panel and gas wall heaters. The living area opens onto a large deck with a decommissioned spa.
Positioned on a gently sloping block of 1,163sqm, there is plenty of space to develop the garden. A 5.4m x 7.2m workshop is ready and awaiting some TLC to store your toys, tools or cars.
Fix and flip or live in and renovate as you go. Properties in the fours are in demand - get on it and snap up your next project!
Please Note:
All property details are correct at the time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold or have gone under offer. We recommend that you confirm the open for inspections are still being conducted by contacting the Agency or the Agents listed on the advertisement.
Insights: 20 Dunstan Road, Avonsleigh VIC 3782 was last sold in 2019 and 7 other 3 bedroom house in Avonsleigh have recently been sold.

Description:
Just Move In and Enjoy!
Situated in the heart of stunning Gembrook is this beautifully presented 3 bedroom home. Nestled privately behind a lush green hedge, this stylishly renovated weatherboard home promises its new owner a relaxed and easy lifestyle.
The home has plenty of modern style and features including luxurious new carpet and neutral tones throughout. The modern kitchen with striking timber benchtops and breakfast bar seamlessly connects with the family meals area and living room. There are 3 bedrooms with built in wardrobes, family bathroom and separate toilet. With split system cooling and cosy wood fire heater your comfort will be assured all year round.
The covered full width back deck overlooks the lush rear garden and is the perfect place to relax with family and friends any time of the year. Clever garden design offers a double level yard area in the back, the top level with a large lawn area incorporating a playground just for the kids. The lower level includes a large garden shed and raised vegetable beds. Landscaped gardens surround this home, with feature rock retaining walls and low maintenance design allowing you to spend more time enjoying your home. Also included is a tandem carport.
With nothing more to do but move in and enjoy this wonderful home, you will have time to stroll into Gembrook to its many cafes and restaurants. Close to shops, public transport, parks, Gembrook Primary School and the iconic Puffing Billy train station, you will absolutely love this home.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Large Family Home on 2 Titles!
A wonderfully unique home situated on a one acre block with two titles the home is on one title allowing you to sell the vacant block should you have the need.
This 4 bedroom, double brick home has an elevated aspect on the high side of Sunnyside Terrace providing great views over tree tops and beyond.
This double storey home has two entries one accesses the lower level living area which comprises of a spacious living area with open fire place and robed bedroom with ensuite. There is a large bar area that could be converted to a kitchenette perfect as dual accommodation an office or studio.
The second entry opens to a foyer which has timber steps leading up to the second level. On this level you enter the enormous living area complete with a brick feature wall encompassing an open fire place; its not hard to imagine the cosy warmth from this fireplace on the cooler winter months. Glass doors open out to the dining area or sun room which has wall to wall windows creating a wonderful light filled room with views an incredible place to spend quality time with friends and family. Another 3 bedrooms are located on this level the master with a large modern ensuite, plenty of robe space and its own private balcony.
Youll enjoy cooking up a storm in the light filled kitchen featuring stunning Blackwood cupboards, gas cooktop and ample bench space. The contemporary feel of this home continues with a European laundry off the kitchen area.
Step through the glass doors from the kitchen area onto the stylish alfresco entertaining area complete with an open fire place and outdoor oven/bbq. The land around the home features mature trees and small shrubs ready for you to add your style and flair.
The current driveway circles around the home providing great access and convenience. Other features include a single carport, single lock up garage/workshop with concrete floor, power and internal access, fenced areas and garden shed.
Just a short drive into Emerald or Monbulk townships.
* 1 acre block with 2 titles
* elevated position
* double brick, 2 storey home on 1 title
* 4 bedroom | 3 bath
* zoned living
* easily convert to dual accommodation
* contemporary design
* impressive outdoor entertaining area
* single carport, single garage
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Immaculate Home - Walk to Everything - What More Could You Want!
Enjoy coming home to this family home with all the comforts and nothing to do but make it your own, situated just a 5 minute stroll from Gembrook township and over the road from the park!
This well presented home offers everything you need:
* 4 good sized bedrooms, three with built in robes,
* Plenty of living space with a family room and a combined living and dining area,
* A light and airy kitchen with gas cook top, fan forced oven, fridge, heaps of bench space which opens onto the meals/2nd living area and outdoor sun room,
* A spacious laundry,
* Gas ducted heating, a split system for convenience, evaporative cooling and ceiling fans,
* Sealed road access,
* A 4 car garage with workshop, remote doors and water connected,
* 2 x paved entertaining areas,
* A garden shed with power connected,
* Stone retaining walls,
* An immaculate tiered lawn,
* Low maintenance landscaped gardens,
* A fully fenced rear yard for kids and pets to play safely,
* Room for the caravan,
* 3KW solar
* A water tank for the garden and
* All services connected.
Easy walking distance to the acclaimed Independent Restaurant, the amazing cafes, the supermarket, the post office which opens 7 days, the most famous Vet in the Hills, the highly regarded child education centre and the primary school - makes this home ideal for families and couples.
Don't miss this one with the lot - CALL Samantha Scott 0438 680 032 TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
A ONE OWNER WONDER ON 1937m2
Designed by the current owners and built using quality hardwood timbers, this much loved home has been a haven for the large family that has grown up here over the last 43 years. Situated on a completely useable block of almost 1/2 an acre, the family has made the most of indoor/outdoor living. Playing hide and seek amongst the lush setting which offers many quiet areas to contemplate life was a joy and on rainy days the full length verandahs offered a sheltered place to ride bikes and scooters or indulge in a tea party. These verandahs welcome a host of colourful native birds with king parrots that feed from your hands. The huge living room has an open fire as a centrepiece and this has been a favourite spot for the kids to sit with a warm drink and relax. Polished hardwood floors add beauty and serviceability to the meals area which adjoins the kitchen. There are four bedrooms, the master has its own ensuite and the family bathroom serves the remaining rooms. The fourth bedroom is enormous and was designed as a multipurpose space so that as the children grew, this area could become a rumpus room, work from home office or gym with its own access. Ducted heating ensures your comfort throughout the entire home. Outdoors there is an in/out driveway, double carport, steel garage and a variety of storage spaces. Meandering pathways lead to secret gardens that are home to a chorus of frogs that inhabit the ponds and there is a barbecue area and plenty of space for additional vehicles and toys. The kindergarten is a short walk away and the Secondary College, General Store, Bam Bams restaurant and bus stop is also walking distance. For the first time ever this home is being offered to the next family to enjoy as much as the original owners.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Absolute Heart of Town
ABSOLUTE HEART OF TOWN
Perfectly located within walking distance to everything that the beautiful hills town of Emerald has to offer is this neat and tidy cedar weatherboard home. Offering 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, family bathroom, and open plan living room with meals area and central kitchen adjoining. Special features include natural gas ducted heating and large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through. Outside you will discover a magnificent 975m2 allotment that boasts plenty of parking, large lawn area, dual road frontage one of which is a sealed road, and there are all services available. Ideally suited to the first home buyer, shrewd investor or downsizer, call today as inspection is a must!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
THE SOUNDS OF NATURE ON 1400M2
Set in a peaceful, private and highly sought after pocket of Emerald is this beautifully presented home that provides the perfect opportunity to secure the quiet country property you desire where the only noisy neighbours are an abundance of colourful native birds and a chorus of frogs that call the nearby waterways home. Boasting modern style throughout there are 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, a light filled living area and an open plan dining area overlooked by the functional kitchen which offers a stunning outlook to the rear yard.
With all the hard work done including: updated kitchen, flooring, fresh paint throughout, rendered exterior, brand new roof and beautifully maintained gardens there is nothing for the lucky new owners to do but move in and enjoy the lifestyle offered.
Sitting on over 1400m2 there is plenty of space for your pets and children to play, while the tranquility of your own private fern gully is breathtaking. The added convenience of a sealed drive, carport and workshop/storage room, ensures all your needs have been catered for.
Only minutes from the center of Emerald, quality schools, multiple eateries, doctors and supermarkets and walking distance to the Avard picnic ground and with an abundance of walking tracks that take you along the Menzies Creek and beyond, your ability to secure the healthy lifestyle you crave is just a phone call away, be sure to book your inspection today.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
WAYANDAH PARK The Very Best in Country Living
Nestled in the heart of Macclesfield, WAYANDAH PARK is an established property second to none for those seeking the very best in a comfortable country lifestyle or the ideal horse property. The character style home has an elevated position on this 10+ acre property providing impressive views over the property and way beyond to the Gembrook ranges.
As you travel up the drive way past the sweeping green pastures and full size all weather horse menage, you will feel like right at home. The 5 bedroom home exudes charm with its full length verandah, upper level dormer windows and colonial double hung windows. Take in the remarkable outlook from the front verandah as you enter this family home.
Inside the floorplan flows seamlessly offering space for the whole family. The generous living and dining area features stunning cathedral ceilings, large windows capturing the views outside and a feature brick wall incorporating a wood fire heater that will provide cosy warmth in the cooler months. From this area enter the Master wing which includes a separate retreat space with external access for some private me-time. This cosy space connects to a bedroom as well as the spacious Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite. This Master wing can easily be converted to dual accommodation ideal for the extended family, visiting friends or for short term stays.
Cook up a treat in the country style kitchen which includes a dishwasher, gas cooktop, gas oven and stylish slate floors which continues out to the family/meals area. Also included on this ground level is the third bedroom, super large laundry and a bathroom with external access for convenience.
On the upper level, pitched ceilings with exposed beams and classic dormer windows let the soft natural light to flood in creating a superb space for perhaps a kids retreat or creative studio space. The large family bathroom and two robed bedrooms are found on this level with one of the bedrooms being exceptionally large with a private balcony access through double glass doors.
Other features include gas ducted heating and split system cooling for climate comfort and ample storage space throughout this home.
Outside features clever design and established infrastructure to cater for the horse enthusiast and to those who simply want to enjoy all that the country lifestyle has to offer.
Large covered gazebo for entertaining
Stunning landscaped gardens and pathways
Full sized all weather menage
8 fenced paddocks
Fully fenced property
Fruit trees almond, lemon, peach, plum, cherry and apple
60 x 20 foot shed
Double carport
Second double carport ideal for storage of floats, boats or machinery
Close to 80,000 litres of water storage
Large dam
Dual property access
Extensive horse trails on your door step
Situated close to Emerald and Cockatoo townships, this impressive property will be snapped up quickly. To arrange for your private viewing, please contact Aaron today!
*** Access this property from Tschampions road - main gate entry is next to 465 Tschampions road.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
***CANCELLED - OPEN FOR INSPECTION - SATURDAY 20TH JULY - CANCELLED***
HOME IS WHERE THE HEART IS IN THE CENTRE OF EMERALD
A home with history, charm, character and style is what everyone dreams of owning. Beautiful from head to toe and graced with features of wrap around verandah, fretwork, ceiling roses, wide skirtings, timber lined ceilings and Baltic pine floors, the timeless appeal is evident from head to toe. The formal lounge has a solid fuel fire as a centrepiece and is the perfect place for those cooler evenings. You will be the envy of every chef with the 900mm Belling stove that has gas hotplates and two ovens plus a separate grill which will allow you to cook up a feast for the family in the central timber kitchen. A cosy meals/family room adjoins this section of the home and has French doors that lead out to a covered decked area complete with a spa. There are four bedrooms, one on the ground floor and the remaining upstairs featuring attic style design with doorma windows, tasteful décor and built in robes. The master is serviced by a full ensuite and has a parents retreat adjoining which could also serve as a study or reading room. The family bathroom is complete with a bath and there is a third toilet downstairs. The attention to detail is outstanding throughout and includes ducted gas heating, split system air-conditioner, 3 kw solar panels and double carport with roller door. Surrounded by a leafy established garden with plenty of space for children and pets, this is a unique opportunity to secure a slice of Emeralds history (we are told this property was originally the Emerald Post Office). Walk to a variety of cafes, shops, kindergarten, highly regarded Primary School and sporting facilities, this is a true original.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Move In With Nothing To Do Except Relax and Take In The Sensational Views!
Available in the heart of Macclesfield is this immaculately presented family home on 10 acres of quality acreage with absolutely stunning 180 degree views of the Warburton Ranges and beyond!
Set well back from the sealed road, this well designed home has features that will appeal to any sized family and includes four robed bedrooms the master with a walk in robe and ensuite. From the moment you drive up the long, tree lined driveway and enter this home, you will be impressed by the feeling of comfort and space with the open plan design together with high ceilings, neutral colour palette and large windows taking in the views and natural light. The well-appointed modern kitchen will appeal to any avid cook with its 900mm cooktop, ample bench space, large pantry and generous island bench which connects with the large family and meals area.
The views from this living area are exceptional and in the cooler months your comfort will be assured with the efficient combustion wood heater, split system and ducted heating. The functional separate lounge and study provide the ideal space needed for all family members.
Outside relax or entertain with friends or family in style all year round with the in-ground solar heated pool and large covered entertaining area which has a built in rotisserie, bbq and wood storage. Sit back in comfort and let the views take your breath away as you enjoy the peaceful sounds of nature. Included are 2 clean and fenced paddocks, two dams - one being spring fed, 2 x 22,000 litre water tanks, fruit trees, established garden, large double garage and a separate large workshop/garage with mezzanine floor.
This well presented property is close to pony club, schools and the Emerald township and will not disappoint.
* 10 clean acres
* sensational views
* 4 bedroom home | 2 bath
* open plan designed home
* immaculately presented
* living zones
* impressive outdoor entertaining area
* 2 dams, one springfed
* large double garage
* sizeable workshop
* Macclesfield address
* sealed road access
* close to pony club & schools
* ready to enjoy!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994

Description:
PERFECT FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT! - 1134m2
Positioned in a quiet and sought after location within easy access of everything that Emerald has to offer is this delightful cedar weatherboard home that is just perfect for you. Set on a useable allotment of over a 1/4 acre the home is surrounded by established gardens and has dual access. The home offers 3 bedrooms, an updated bathroom, gas ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, L shaped lounge and dining plus a well located kitchen that is perfect for the chef in the family and has an outlook to the rear yard. There is also a covered deck that is ideal for outdoor entertaining or is the perfect place to sit back and relax with family and friends. Also on offer is a double carport, single garage, side access, fenced and useable yard and solar power to save you paying huge energy bills. Ideal as a first home or a great property to add to your investment portfolio.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
FROM US TO YOU AFTER 42 YEARS! - 3000m2
A perfectly flat block of almost 3/4 of an acre featuring a colourful array of established trees and shrubs surrounds this much loved home that has been beautifully kept by the current owners for over 40 years. Designed so that every window offers a view to the picturesque setting, every room benefits from the leafy outlook. Both living rooms have doors that lead out to a balcony that is the ideal place to enjoy alfresco dining while a chorus of native birds serenade you. The light filled kitchen features clean lines, gas hot plates, under bench oven and dishwasher and allows the chef to cook up a culinary masterpiece while the family chats with them from the family room. There are four bedrooms, the master is serviced by a full ensuite and has a wall of robes. The second bedroom is king sized and has its own access making this the ideal room to double as a work from home studio, home office or teenagers room. Double hung windows, polished floor boards and tasteful decor provide a wonderful atmosphere whilst ducted gas heating, gas log fire and split system heating/cooling caters to year round comfort. 5kw solar system will save you money and assist the environment. A double carport under roofline and workshop/man cave complete a picture perfect property. Direct access to major roads including Wellington Road makes commuting easy, bus line passes the door to connect to Belgrave train station and a short drive will have you at the centre of Emerald, Primary School, kindergarten and sporting facilities. This is the ultimate in country living with everything at your fingertips.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Mudbrick Haven on 1 Acre of Serenity
The hills is renowned for attracting urbanites seeking an escape from the regular routine. Come strengthen your connection to nature in this eco-house nestled in a sublime setting amongst the eucalyptus, native hazels & banksia trees. A beautifully engineered post-and-beam construction, with internal walls of some 7,500 handmade mud bricks. The thermal mass of these walls means the internal temperature remains stable and cool or warm and toasty depending on the season.
A haven for nature lovers and families, yet an easy commute to Melbourne - a perfect way to join the urban escape club!
+ oversized garage with
+ large workshop and
+ mezzanine storage
+ recycled redbrick pathways
+ close to numerous walking tracks
+ mains water
+ 40,000 litre underground water tank

Description:
CONVENIENT AND COMFORTABLE
Conveniently located this modern brick and weatherboard home has everything at its doorstep.
Positioned at the end of the quiet Vista Court cul-de-sac, this highly sought-after location is walking distance to Gembrook village and nearby Gembrook Park.
Incorporating:
* 4 bedrooms, main with ensuite and walk in robe
* 2 separate living zones
* contemporary kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a fabulous butlers pantry and adjoining dining zone * double garage with internal access
*paved outdoor entertaining
* fenced rear yard.
Extras: ducted heating and cooling, a woodfire, 5000lt water tank for toilet and garden use, solar boosted hot water service
Location: many family friendly facilities including Primary School, Early Learning Centre, Community Centre, Scout Group and local sporting clubs.
Gembrook has attractions like Gembrook Markets, Skate Park, Kurth Kiln, Bunyip State Park and of course it is home to Puffing Billy at the end of the line.
Set in beautiful gardens on a 778m2 allotment, this home is sure to delight those looking for a comfortable, quality residence with all the trimmings. Your most welcome to make a private appointment or come to an open house.
Contact Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 to arrange your inspection today!

Call Riley Nicholas today on 0488 501 218!

Description:
CUSTOM BUILT FOR YOUR TOTAL ENJOYMENT
Centrally located and with made road access, this much loved home is a stand out with large windows allowing plenty of natural light and high ceilings providing a sense of space and adding to the liveability and enjoyment of the property. Built for comfort, every room is of the most generous proportions including all three bedrooms, two will cater for queen sized beds and the master can easily accommodate a king sized bed and is serviced by a walk in robe and full ensuite. The second and third bedrooms adjoin the spacious family bathroom which comes complete with a bath. The living room has a cosy wood fire to curly up in front of on cooler evenings and ducted gas heating and a split system ensure just the right temperature year round. A big country style kitchen/meals area will be the hub of the home with plenty of cupboards and bench space, gas hotplates, wall oven & dishwasher and a beautiful outlook through picture windows to the leafy garden. Outdoors is a tradies dream with an abundance of vehicle storage including 3 carports and a double sized garage/workshop, garden shed and plenty of additional car parking space. If you have a caravan or boat, this area would be ideal as the rear yard is fully fenced. With the kindergarten just a short walk away and easy access to the Primary School, shops, child minding centre, Puffing Billy and a variety of parks, this is the perfect property for you.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Prime Position Family Home on ½ Acre
Perfectly positioned with lovely valley views, this wonderful home sits on a usable allotment of just over half an acre providing space for all the family.
From the moment you step into this lovely property you feel instantly at home with natural light filled rooms, earthy tones and a mix of polished floor boards and lush carpet. The open plan kitchen and meals area features an open fire place with striking copper canopy. The spacious family room invites you in with a cosy wood fire heater built into a feature brick wall, split system cooling and glass bi-fold doors that open up to a generous sunroom ideal as a games room or rumpus room. Cooking up a storm for family and friends will be a pleasure in the large kitchen featuring ample storage, dishwasher, pantry and an island bench.
The 3 comfortable bedrooms are all robed , the master bedroom, which has access to the back deck, also includes a walk in robe and a renovated ensuite with a classic French provincial flair.
Outside is equally as impressive as the inside with a large covered, elevated deck which provides plenty of space to enjoy and relax on while overlooking the generous backyard. Incorporated in the yard are three garden/storage sheds, wood shed, 6 x 13 garage/workshop with concrete floor, power, water and its very own wood heater perfectly set up for the tradesperson or handyperson. The dual access into this property and ample parking space allows easy access and turning for trucks, trailers and caravans. This property also features a double carport, fully fenced yard, garden full of established trees, flowering azaleas and rhododendrons for brilliant winter colour.
Less than 2 kilometres to the heart of Gembrook Township and an easy 15 drive to Pakenham, this home is well located. To make your hills dream a reality, inspect this property today!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
RURAL VIEWS! 1/4 ACRE! WHERE DO I SIGN????
How fabulous is this starter? A fantastic location! Approximately a 1/4 of an acre of useable land! Beautiful views from the back deck!
Also; an open plan layout with 3 bedrooms all with BIRs, a front verandah, spacious light filled family room with toasty wood fire, a lounge and dining space, youll enjoy great storage and bench space in the timber kitchen, a nicely updated bathroom with bath/shower combo and a separate laundry. The ducted heating and split system ensure year-round comfort. There is also plenty of parking, a double carport, and shedding. The best surprise here is the views of paddocks with sheep, alpacas and a goat, so nice to look across and feel you are in the country, yet you are just minutes to Emerald Township and Westfield Fountain Gate, the M1 and Eastlink are easily accessible. You really get the best of both worlds here, a country vibe and city convenience. Take advantage of your first home buyer stamp duty exemption and make this wonderful property yours today. Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection now!

Description:
Location, Location, Location - With Views to Match!
Located just a few hundred metres from Woolworths and Emerald Village and with gorgeous views of the hills and valleys beyond, this attractive family home is going to be popular!
The home sits privately behind its paling fence with a fern filled landscaped garden, paved driveway and double carport. Offering 3 bedrooms with built in robes, the spacious Master also includes an ensuite. The good sized open plan kitchen and dining includes a cosy wood fire heater perfect for those cooler days. An impressive wide hallway leads to the large living room and study/4th bedroom. The full sized windows in this living area provide stunning views of the Grampian ranges and a sliding door provides access to the rear elevated balcony.
Relax on the east facing balcony taking in the wonderful views while overlooking the fully fenced and well maintained rear garden with usable flat lawn, perfect for the kids or your fury friends to play in safety. Features of the home include ducted vacuum system, hydronic heating and split system cooling for year round comfort.
This home is spacious and comfortable with an unbeatable location, book your private inspection today before it's gone!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820
